Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Reroute at Racine/50th
ShortDescription: 44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 51st, Halsted and 47th: due to, street blockage near Racine/50th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 51st, Halsted and 47th: due to, street blockage near Racine/50th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No Trains Between Damen and Racine
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Damen and Racine due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Damen and Racine due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between O'Hare and Damen, and,
  • between Racine and Forest Park, only.

Shuttle buses are available Damen and Racine to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Delays Limited Service
ShortDescription: Green Line service limited service. Shuttle available btwn Cottage Grove & Garfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are experiencing delays due to signal problems. We are working to run as much service as frequently and as evenly as possible.

Currently, trains are operating in one section:

  • between Harlem and Ashland/63rd

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service to Cottage Grove.

See station personnel for further assistance and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
